project_descr: The Vanuatu parliament ratified the Paris agreement on 18th June 2016. The Vanuatu NDC project is part of the major commitments towards UNFCCC under the Low Emission Capacity Building (LECB) Programme phase II.

outputs.output_descr: The project aims to assist Vanuatu to strengthen and harmonize the policies, institutional frameworks and national MRV systems to mainstream national mitigation policies and targets in the context of Nationally Determined Contributions (NDCs).

project_title: vanuatu low emissions capacity building phase ii
